content: hit the road with this trendy crochet backpack made with just 14 squares of red heart all in one flower power straps back hanging loop and drawstring flap are done in a contrasting color of red heart super saver practice a variety of techniques including flat slip_stitch join double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and more sewn-in fabric enhances durability making this retro sack a functional choice for everyday use materials red heart® all in one™ flower power™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m contrast a cherry blossom 2000 2 balls or 14 flower power motifs red heart® super saver™ 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast b shocking pink 0718 1 ball or 178 yds/163 m gauge motif = approx 6 15 cm square using larger hook 16 single_crochet and 17 row = 4 10 cm with smaller hook measurements approx 14 35 5 cm tall x 12 30 5 cm wide excluding handle and straps
